keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: This Caribbean curry can also be made with mutton or lamb.

method.text: Prepare the meat. Mix well with the salt, garlic, rind and juice. Leave to marinate in the fridge for 1-1 days.

In a large pan, fry the onion gently in the oil, until golden. Add the meat. Stir over a high heat until sealed on all sides. Add the curry powder, pepper sauce, tomato puree, coconut and coriander stalks. Cook for 5 min.
Add the water, bring to the boil and cover. Simmer gently, stirring occasionally for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> - 1 days until meat is very tender. Adjust seasoning.
Add the remaining coriander to serve.

title: 'Goat' curry
